elif.descr:
#elif TEST
The combination of an #else and an #if preprocessor directive.
elif.name: #elif

else.descr: Used after an #if to start an else block which is executed if the condition is false.
else.name: #else

endif.descr: Marks the end of an #if/#else block.
endif.name: #endif

if.descr:
#if !DEBUG
Discards the sourcecode after the #if-directive if the condition is false.
if.name: #if

importif.descr:
#importif !DEBUG "file2.asm"
Imports another sourcefile if the given expression is evaluated to true.
importif.name: #importif

importonce.descr: Make the assembler skip the current file if it has already been imported.
importonce.name: #importonce

undef.descr: Removes the definition of a preprocessor symbol.
undef.name: #undef
